username.title: Username
username.description: Username to connect to Salesforce. This user should have privileges to read all the metadata in Salesforce.

securityToken.title: Security Token
securityToken.description: Salesforce Security Token for username/password authentication.

consumerKey.title: Consumer Key
consumerKey.description: Salesforce Consumer Key (Client ID) for OAuth 2.0 authentication. This is obtained from your Salesforce Connected App configuration. Required along with Consumer Secret for OAuth authentication.

consumerSecret.title: Consumer Secret
consumerSecret.description: Salesforce Consumer Secret (Client Secret) for OAuth 2.0 authentication. This is obtained from your Salesforce Connected App configuration. Required along with Consumer Key for OAuth authentication.

organizationId.title: Salesforce Organization ID
organizationId.description: Salesforce Organization ID is the unique identifier for your Salesforce identity

databaseName.title: Database Name
databaseName.description: Optional name to give to the database in OpenMetadata. If left blank, we will use default as the database name.

salesforceApiVersion.title: Salesforce API Version
salesforceApiVersion.description: API version of the Salesforce instance

oneOf.title: Validate SSL Client Config
oneOf.description: OpenMetadata Client configured to validate SSL certificates.

caCertificate.title: CA Certificate
caCertificate.description: The CA certificate used for SSL validation.

sslCertificate.title: SSL Certificate
sslCertificate.description: The SSL certificate used for client authentication.

sslKey.title: SSL Key
sslKey.description: The private key associated with the SSL certificate.

connectionOptions.title: Connection Options
connectionOptions.description: Additional connection options to build the URL that can be sent to service during the connection.

connectionArguments.title: Connection Arguments
connectionArguments.description: Additional connection arguments such as security or protocol configs that can be sent to service during connection.

schemaFilterPattern.title: Default Schema Filter Pattern
schemaFilterPattern.description: Regex to only include/exclude schemas that matches the pattern.

includes.description: List of strings/regex patterns to match and include only database entities that match.

excludes.description: List of strings/regex patterns to match and exclude only database entities that match.

tableFilterPattern.title: Default Table Filter Pattern
tableFilterPattern.description: Regex to only include/exclude tables that matches the pattern.

includes.description: List of strings/regex patterns to match and include only database entities that match.

excludes.description: List of strings/regex patterns to match and exclude only database entities that match.

databaseFilterPattern.title: Default Database Filter Pattern
databaseFilterPattern.description: Regex to only include/exclude databases that matches the pattern.

includes.description: List of strings/regex patterns to match and include only database entities that match.

excludes.description: List of strings/regex patterns to match and exclude only database entities that match.
